name: Sophia's World: Jump And Run
description:
Help Sophia find and rescue kidnapped animals.

Fun for all age groups!
In this Jump ‘n Run game for people of all ages, you can guide Sophia through the vividly colored levels and worlds. On each level, there are many hidden coins. You’ll want to avoid animals such as snails, field mice and turtles however.

Classic platform game play in modern garb!
Playing this classic Jump ‘n Run game, you'll note it is jam packed with vividly colored, timeless graphics and cute characters. It’s fun for the whole family: from the youngest to as old as your Granny. Everyone can grasp the purpose of the game immediately and will not be able to resist trying to snatch up all the coins for all the levels.

Day and Night Levels
You can alternate between a daytime and a nighttime level. There are a total of 24 exciting levels waiting for you to explore them. More levels can be provided, if you like the game just that much.

Great Soundtrack
Great music (which can be muted) and stellar sound effects will accompany you on your adventures throughout Sophia's world.

Please don't hesitate to write feedback to: info@intermediaware.de.
